mapper.select: SELECT board_id, emp_id, emp_name, board_category_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_file_yn FROM boards WHERE board_id = 21
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards (board_id, emp_id, board_category_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_file_yn) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_ID.NEXTVAL, #{empId}, #{boardCategoryId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, default, #{boardFileYn})
mapper.select: SELECT board_id, emp_id, emp_name, board_category_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_file_yn FROM ( SELECT rnum, board_id, emp_id, emp_name, board_category_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_file_yn FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, board_id, emp_id, emp_name, board_category_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_file_yn FROM boards ORDER BY board_date DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{pager.rowsPerPage} * #{pager.pageNo} ) WHERE rnum > (#{pager.rowsPerPage} * (#{pager.pageNo} - 1))

SELECT board_id, emp_id, board_category_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_file_yn FROM ( SELECT rnum, board_id, emp_id, board_category_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_file_yn FROM ( SELECT rownum as rnum, board_id, emp_id, board_category_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_file_yn FROM boards WHERE board_title = #{title} ORDER BY board_date DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{pager.rowsPerPage} * #{pager.pageNo} ) WHERE rnum > (#{pager.rowsPerPage} * (#{pager.pageNo} - 1))
